name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
description: Balanced Gemini 2.5 model offering excellent performance at lower cost. Features optional thinking mode for complex reasoning tasks.
notes: Unified pricing: $0.30/1M input, $2.50/1M output (non-thinking), $3.50/1M thinking output. Audio input: $1.00/1M tokens. Supports 1M token context. Best balance of speed, quality, and cost.
